articles.content: The multi-year deal will also run through the next non-FIFA game

articles.author: Daniel Matthews
articles.title: Arsenal technical director Edu says big-money flops were 'killing' the club - Daily Mail
articles.description: DANIEL MATTHEWS IN ORLANDO: Edu will soon discover if he really did read the runes. He told Arsenal's board a couple of years ago: '2022-23 will be the season we are going to be much better.'
articles.content:
Very soon, Edu will discover if he really did read the runes.
'Guys,' the technical director told Mikel Arteta and the Arsenal board a couple of years back. '2022-2023 will be the season we're going… [+6146 chars]

articles.author: Kishan Vaghela
articles.title: Xavi 'has asked Barcelona to re-sign Lionel Messi next summer once his contract at PSG expires' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Argentina international  broke his 20-year association with the Catalan giants by signing a two-year contract with Ligue 1 champions Paris Saint-Germain in August.
articles.content:
Xavi has urged Barcelona to bring about a sensational return for club legend Lionel Messi next summer, according to reports in Spain.
Messi was expected to extend his deal with Barcelona last summer… [+2385 chars]
